Amurex – Your AI Meeting Copilot (Early Preview)

Take the hassle out of meetings with Amurex, the ultimate Chrome extension that transforms how you manage and stay productive during meetings.

Key Features
💬 Real-time Suggestions During Meetings
Get intelligent suggestions tailored to the context of your meeting—right when you need them.

📋 Smart Summaries & Key Takeaways
Say goodbye to manual note-taking. Amurex automatically generates comprehensive summaries and action items so you can focus on the conversation.

⏱️ Late Join Recap
Running late? No problem. Amurex provides a quick recap of everything you missed so you can jump in without disrupting the flow.

📝 Full Meeting Transcripts
Accurate, real-time transcription ensures you never miss a detail, no matter how fast the conversation moves.

📧 Built-in Follow-up Emails
Generate professional follow-up emails with one click, saving you time and ensuring nothing falls through the cracks.
